item.title: Interaction terms in logit and probit model
item.description: Short summary: 1) As I know, there is not a generally accepted idea about the relation between the main effect and the effect of interaction terms. And most statisticians do not recommend that analysist directly interpret the main effect through the interaction terms. 2) The null hypothesis of Î²3 (the coefficients of the interaction term) is there is no interaction effect. If the p-value is less than 0.05, we could reject the null hypothesis, say that there’s an interaction effect.

item.title: About
item.description: This is Mengyao Lin. You could contact with me via e-mail. My e-mail address is linmengyao777@gmail.com. Image source
